title: Why Choose Tasting Mallorca?
subtitle: We believe in travel that connects you to the soul of a place. Forget crowded buses and tourist traps. We offer authentic experiences in small groups, where you can savor the real Mallorca, its culture, its people, and its traditions.

item1.title: Beyond the Tourist Trail
item1.description: Our routes are designed to show you the hidden gems of the island. We take you to family-run vineyards, ancient olive groves, and villages where time seems to stand still.

item2.title: Small Groups, Big Experiences
item2.description: With a maximum of 8 people per tour, we ensure a personal and intimate atmosphere. This allows for real conversations, spontaneous stops, and a deeper connection with your guide and fellow travelers.
